ComicInfo.Summary: When the Money Runs Out; (Sanctuary Book Five: The Wolf - Chapter Three): Lusiphur goes to a bar where William Perry hangs out (and where Balinarch & Friedrich, from "I, Lusiphur" v1#5, have just gotten jobs) and kills a bunch of people trying to get Perry to tell him who killed Cassy. Perry tells him Jace did.
ComicInfo.Tags: Sanctuary Book 5: The Wolf One: Freedoms Just Another Word For Nothing Left To Lose,Friedrich,William Perry,Lusiphur,Blood Guard,Balinarch
